name: Nikolanaumov.com
body:
### Hello everyone.
My name is Nikola Naumov and i am Web Designer and Web Developer living in Walthamstow, London.


WORK EXPERIENCE
Web Designer and Web Developer
Cube12 Design - Plovdiv, Bulgaria - February 2014 to August 2016
Duties included: Design and develop websites for our customers, implement custom functionalities, maintain updates and optimization. Implementation of external services such as Paypal, DHL, eMag integration etc Development of eCommerce websites, Portfolio websites, Event websites, Local listing websites and even Facebook Gallery websites for nightclub owners.
Graphic design of logos, business cards, flyers, restaurant menus, signs and even mobile apps.
In this role I have contact with the business owners and managers and have the opportunity to understand how people look at the business.
Skills developed: Team work, working with our clients and communicate politely and efficiently, also working strictly with deadlines.
Portfolio: https://cube12.net/portfolios/
Other work experience
Bartender
"SINATRA" - June 2009 to February 2014
Duties included:
Skills developed:
Other work experience
VOIP gateway manager
"EXPRESS LINK MOBILE" - July 2006 to June 2009
Duties included: Supporting the system in operation and daily routine tasks connected with the process, such as checking for bad connection channels and optimizing the resource in use; developing daily check-list for activity done and incomes.
Skills developed: Understanding the way system for Internet calls works. Ready to operate with systems like ECOTEL Vierling GATEWAYS and SIM MANAGMENT SERVERS.
IT and Language skills
IT:
Proficient in: Adobe Photoshop CC, Adobe Illustrator CC, Adobe InDesign CC, AutoCad 2015
Known programming languages: HTML, CSS 
Basic knowledge of: JavaScript, Angular JS, SASS
Known CMS Platforms: Wordpress, Prestashop, Joomla
Known web tools: Chrome Development console, Google Analytics, Google Adwords, Google Pagespeed
Insight, Google Webmaster tools, Cpanel
Proficient in Windows programs - Word, Excel, Power point, Access.
Intermediate Linux server knowledge.
Certificate from Digital Garage - Online Marketing Fundamentals
EDUCATION
BA
Varna Free University - Plovdiv, Bulgaria
2014 to Present
LINKS
https://cube12.net/portfolios
https://www.linkedin.com/in/nikola-naumov-web-design

CERTIFICATIONS
Digital Garage - The online marketing fundamentals
